short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Help teachers to fill daily attendance

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The APDM lack of one function that the teachers cannot uncheck / check all the checkbox beside the names of the students instantly. This extension add this function in the context menu.
